action.msg: Well, this is it.
Hey, I never said it would be pretty.
This place is creeping me out.
I feel like someone's watching us...
Well, we ARE in the presence of God.
Speaking of, aren't you a demon? Shouldn't this place be burning you alive or something?
You'd be surprised how many demons choose to have God as who they follow.
I don't really understand it, but I guess I'm in no place to really judge.
This place has been run-down for a LONG time.
When I first came to Fever Town, it was... empty. Abandoned buildings everywhere, a ghost town. Hell, I have no idea why I stayed.
But I did, and after some cleaning up, more and more people came. And let me say, back then, it was barely as pretty as it is now.
I kinda miss those days.
So, what WAS the reason for you coming to some random spot in the middle of nowhere?
It's a long story. Weird, too.
Yeah, I'm beginning to realize that's common here huh?
See? I knew she'd like the place.
Oh sure, what isn't there to like? She'll have plenty of company, too.
Like that roach over there. And that one. And that bird carcass.
Y'know, when she isn't yelling about sending us to the front gates, she's kind of cute, in a way.
HEY, OKAY I TAKE IT BACK-
Oh, he just wants to sing some more.
You got that just from her expression? And why are you so calm about all of this?
I mean, I had the feeling he wasn't all that bad from when we sang earlier.
She... tried to slice you in half.
Babe, I'm a demon. Stuff like that is super normal for us. People hunting us down, I mean.
Yeah okay, whatever.
I'll pick something nice.
